sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import { Button } from "@material-ui/core"; import SendIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Send"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import { MainContainer, DashboardContainer, ControlsContainer, ChartsContainer, LogoContainer, MainTitle, SocChartsContainer, EnvChartsContainer, LandFillContainer, EmissionContainer, ReqContainer, ChartPaper, colorRed, ChartTitle, colorGreen } from "./styles"; import { ValueContainer, MapContainer, ControlContainer, FamiliesContainer } from "./containers"; import { Message } from "./components"; import { fontSizeM, FlexContainer, TextSpan, fontWeightL, fontSizeXL } from "../../styles"; import { LandFillSubContainer } from "./styles/styledContainers"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { selectAllSelectedItems, selectAllSelectedPrice, selectAllSelectedVolume, selectAllSelectedWeight } from "../../store/furnitureBankReducer/selectors"; import { ConvertedNumber } from "../../components"; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ button: { background: colorRed, color: "white", fontSize: fontSizeM, boxShadow: "none", "&:hover": { background: colorRed, color: "white" } } })); const AVG_MONTHLY_WASTE = 130; const AVG_WEEKLY_WASTE = 30; const Dashboard = () => { const classes = useStyles(); const [ monthCount, setMonthCount ] = useState(0) const items = useSelector(selectAllSelectedItems); const price = useSelector(selectAllSelectedPrice); const weight = useSelector(selectAllSelectedWeight); const volume = useSelector(selectAllSelectedVolume); const getMonth = weight => Math.floor(weight/AVG_MONTHLY_WASTE) useEffect(() => { if(getMonth(weight) !== monthCount){ setMonthCount(getMonth(weight)) } }, [monthCount, weight]) console.log(monthCount); return ( <> Furniture Bank 2019 What is the estimated social impact of your donation? What is the estimated environmental impact of your donation? What is the estimated amount of waste saved? 2 months and 2 weeks of waste in an avg. Canadian household Number Icons Equivalent to 20% of an avg. cargo container What is the estimated CO2 emission saved? ); }; export default Dashboard;
